name: PlanetsVSHumans
description:
Your goal is to save the different planets from their extinction. Use your skills to kill the population and keep them all alive.

Game Week from: 05/09/2022 to 09/09/2022.

The game had to respect the oneliner: "10 billion consumers".

Credits:

GP- Jarod Sengkeo
